alert.note: Alert for Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 22 at 3:52PM EST until February 23 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Total ice accumulations of up to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Van Buren and Kalamazoo counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest icing in Van Buren and Kalamazoo Counties will occur over the northern portions. The precipitation may change to ordinary rain over the southern portion of these counties.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.
